txt.en: You have been asked to prepare the Jangovars' weapons for a dwarf attack.
You should talk to Tuhâl, who can be found in Utterby.
Jangovar spears and bows can be found around Utterby.\n\nYou should sabotage Jangovar spears and bows.
You should talk to Otkóz, who can be found inside Utterby.

'I have another task for you, Chayasír. Unsurprisingly, the dwarf weapons are in excellent condition, but our own weapons are in need of repair after the battle at the Lonely Mountain. Spears need to be sharpened and polished, and bows strung tight. I leave this to you, but do not tarry. We need to be prepared for a dwarf attack.'
'Another perfect opportunity to turn the tides against these Jangovar fools! Sabotage the weapons quietly, and they will have no chance against the dwarves.'
'It is done, then? Good. You have certainly proven your worth, Chayasír. Perhaps you will soon meet Akh-gulûkh.'
